name: Bike Racing Mania
description:
Racing Mania Bike is an exciting, action packed BMX bike riding game. Fast Bikes and Insane stunts in Racing Mania Bike will keep you addicted to the game for hours!
It is fun, challenging and will test your patience for sure! Perform crazy stunts, do awesome backflips and thrilling front flips to get a top 3 star rating!
Drive through a variety of treacherous tracks while enjoying the realistic bike physics and fast-paced gameplay.
Come and play the most exciting bike stunts game. In Racing Mania Bike, you will feel like a real stunt rider! Experience the exhilarating action! Be a Stunts Bike Rider!
FEATURES of Racing Mania Bike:
- Unique bikes to choose from
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Realistic Bike Physics
- Simulator like controls
- Fun and peppy game music
- Easy to learn and drive
Racing Mania Bike is a fast paced, challenging game to play. Do as many backflips and front flips as you can to get a better score.
Racing Mania Bike is an exciting bike stunts game that will get your adrenaline pumping!
So what are you waiting for? Get Racing Mania Bike Free NOW!
